title: smoothie

created_time: February 12, 2023, 10:02:25 PMLast edit: March 01, 2023, 05:29:58 PM by smoothie
content: Donation Auction #1 For Cold Key VictimsLOT 1ONE 1 oz 999 fine silver 2022 BTC Lealana coin (BUYER FUNDED holo marked, no key, or blank)  (Donated by Smoothie)* Note - shipping on this item will be a bit delayed given all donation items have yet to be shipped to minerjones. See note 2 as well.**Note 2 - whomever wins has a choice of having this coin blank/no holo/no key, or with holo/key marked buyer funded. Coin comes with no Digital valueLOT 2ONE Alpen Coin 500,000 Satoshi Silver plated bar serial D199 loaded with 0.005 BTC (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)LOT 32x 1 BTX Moonbits titan finish chip (Donated by Kryptowerk)LOT 4ONE Bitcoin Apex Print "Orange Pilled" (Donated by Humble Bitcoiners) and ONE half silver ball from the Itokawa wallet... Around 0.8 ozt of fine silver LOT 516 card set of the Ballet Holiday cards Year 2022 Four designs in Four denominations unloaded  (Donated by geophphreigh)LOT 6ONE 5oz Fine Silver 999.9 GENESIS ingot Buyer Funded Edition (Donated by MrCryptHodl) LOT 7ONE 2020 Bitcoin Poker Chip 9-chip set (Donated by Hookzup1)LOT 8ONE TGBEX 2 BTC denomination silver coin (unloaded/without keys) (Donated by TGBEX)Note - pix is of the 1 BTC denomination as TGBEX could not find a picture of the 2btc denomination coin.LOT 9ONE F*D Litecoin Coin 2017 1 oz FS #990, ONE F*D Dark Coin 2015 (prior to name change to Dash Coin), ONE F*D BCH Coin 1 oz FS #034 (Donated by MoparMiningLLC)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________1) ONE 1 oz 999 fine silver 2022 BTC Lealana coin (BUYER FUNDED holo marked, no key, or blank) (Donated by Smoothie)2) Alpen Coin 500,000 Satoshi Silver plated bar serial D199 loaded with 0.005 BTC (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)3) 2x 1 BTX Moonbits titan finish chip  (Donated by Kryptowerk)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________4) ONE Bitcoin Apex Print "Orange Pilled" ONE half silver ball from the Itokawa wallet (Donated by Humble Bitcoiners)5) 16 card set of the Ballet Holiday cards Year 2022 Four designs in Four denominations unloaded  (Donated by geophphreigh)6) ONE 5oz Fine Silver 999.9 GENESIS ingot Buyer Funded Edition (Donated by MrCryptHodl)_________________________________________________________________________________________________________7) ONE 2020 Bitcoin Poker Chip 9-chip set (Donated by Hookzup1) ONE TGBEX 2 BTC denomination silver coin (unloaded/without keys) (Donated by TGBEX)9) ONE F*D Litecoin Coin 2017 1 oz FS #990, ONE F*D Dark Coin 2015 (prior to name change to Dash Coin), ONE F*D BCH Coin 1 oz FS #034, ONE Moonbits 1 BTX Coin M2576, ONE Moonbits 100 MEC Coin #F0061(Donated by MoparMiningLLC)Starting Bid for all lots: 0.00 BTCMinimum Bid increment for all lots is 0.0001END TIME:  February 16th, 2023  6:00PM ESTPayment is due within 24 hours of auction ending.SNIPING: Any bid made in the last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction an additional 5 minutes PER LOT.If no new bid is made within the 5 minute extension the auction will end, if a bid does come within that 5 minute period, the auction extends 5 minutes from the time that last bid was made.PAYMENT: Bitcoin See PGP bitcoin address from MinerJones belowShipping is based on location and preference. Please contact minerjones if you win an auction lot.Regarding payment confirmation please also contact MJ.-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA512February 1 2023 minerjones using address bc1qw5v9xtsasvrecnypx95gmew6ptzzy3fprr7gy9 to accept proceeds from the Coldkey victim auctions-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----Version: Keybase OpenPGP v2.1.13Comment: https://keybase.-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Wanting a little clarification as I’ve seen auctions ran different ways and I am not exactly sure how this one will be ran…. I read the terms, but figured direct clarification will keep everyone notified Does each lot close individually or if someone bids on a single lot with in the last 5 minutes, does it restart the clock on all lots or just the single lot that was bid on?Thanks!
